podcasts

  • 5 live Football Daily

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Football results, analysis, debate & exclusive interviews featuring the Monday Night Club, the best of Kicking Off & Sports Report. Mark Chapman, Mark Pougatch, Colin Murray, Eleanor Oldroyd & Ian Payne host with contributions from Robbie Savage, John Motson, Steve Claridge, Pat Nevin, Lee Dixon, Mark Lawrenson & David Pleat covering the Premier League, Championship, football leagues, Champions League, the FA Cup & international football.

  • 5 live's World Football Phone-in

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Expert answers to your questions in World Football: The Phone-in from BBC Radio 5 live's Up All Night programme.

  • Australian FourFourTwo Insider

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Join the Aussie FourFourTwo crew Jacko & Trev plus regular guests as they wade through the biggest news and events of the week in Australian and world football.

  • European Football Show

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    The European Football Show is a new podcast launching in June that takes you on a journey across the continent to discuss the stories that matter. Presenter Dave Farrar will be joined by European football writer Ben Lyttleton and a host of guests, including Gabriele Marcotti, Jonathan Wilson and Iain Dowie, to go behind the European headlines, while there will also be regular tactical analysis from Zonal Marking's Michael Cox.

    Football Reviews and Previews with an Asia-Pacific Perspective

  • Footballistically Arsenal

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Boyd Hilton, Dermot O’Leary and Dan Baldwin are “Footballistically Arsenal”. Basically it’s three club level media-ponces talk Arsenal.

  • Forza Futbol

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    A sharper lens into Spain Football. We cover the biggest soccer league in Europe, all the latest news and gossip from La Liga, and the rest of the World's Game.

  • Hand of Pod

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Hand Of Pod covers the world of Argentine football, from the domestic league to the national team. Sam Kelly, Sebastian García and the Dans Colasimone and Edwards guide you through one of the world's most unpredictable and interesting leagues.

  • Heart and hand

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Rangers FC are the world’s most successful club. Follow the ups and downs of Scotland’s biggest team with this funny and often controversial podcast. David Edgar hosts the show which doesn’t shirk the major issues at Ibrox and revels in being for Rangers fans, by Rangers fans. We are the people!

  • Inside West Ham United

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    The most comprehensive coverage of West Ham United. Presented by BBC London 94.9FM, stay in contact with everything that's going on at the Boleyn Ground by listening to the podcast every Thursday. Includes the latest team news, player and manager interviews as well as features covering the club's community initiatives.

  • It's Up For Grabs Now

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Alan Davies welcomes you to his new Arsenal podcast. Imagine the humour of QI, set within an Arsenal themed radio show, and there you have, “It’s Up For Grabs Now – The Arsenal Podcast”, a constant Number 1 podcast during 2010.

  • Jeff Stelling's Fantasy Football

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Jeff Stelling will bring you his Fantasy Football takes ahead of every round of Premier League games, so you know who to draft in or ditch from your own line-up.

  • Leicester City Football Forum

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    BBC Radio Leicester’s Ian Stringer and former Foxes striker Alan Young join Martin Ballard to discuss all things Leicester City. Download to hear debate, features and interviews as well as special guests in the studio from the manager to the kit man.

  • Never Write Off The Germans

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    The comedy football podcast devoted to the 2012 Euros. Ashley Blaker is the host with four funny guests ready to laugh at everything happening in Poland and Ukraine.

  • Non League Football Show

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    For the fans, by the fans; a non-League football show with the best guests and latest news from the world of grassroots football.

  • Not Just A Matter of Life & Death

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Iain Coyle hosts, ‘Not Just a Matter of Life and Death – The Liverpool Podcast’ and looks at Liverpool Football Club; the team, the players, the manager, the trophies, the five European victories and wonders who will own the club by Thusrday.

  • Off the Ball

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Scottish football gets a kicking from BBC Radio Scotland’s Off the Ball, presented by Stuart Cosgrove and Tam Cowan. The long-running irreverent programme is broadcast on Saturdays at lunch-time and there is a Sunday Supplement too, ensuring a weekend full of laughter. Get the best of both in this weekly podcast.

  • Open All The R's – The QPR Podcast

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    David Fraser, Chris Mendes and Paul Finney get promoted to the Podcast Premier League with Open All R’s, a podcast that’s all about Queens Park Rangers and not much else (because nothing else matters).

  • Scottish Football

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Keep right up to date with what's happening in Scottish football by downloading the daily BBC Scottish football podcast. Breaking stories, match reaction, big names and insights into our national game. A must for your daily diet of football.

  • Stop! Hammer Time

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    STOP! Hammer Time; the West Ham United Podcast for lovers of irresponsible speculation, wild theorising and potentially libellous songs about overweight former players. Subscribe now before Sheffied United try and get us taken off the air.

  • Sunday Supplement

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Some of the nation's finest football writers, including the likes of Martin Samuel, Henry Winter, Patrick Barclay, Oliver Holt and Sam Wallace, discuss and dissect the burning issues in the beautiful game with Brian Woolnough.

  • The ESPNsoccernet Podcast

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Join Dan Mason and the ESPN team for news and debate on English football. Tune in for analysis on all the goals, incidents and talking points on the Barclays Premier League, UEFA Champions League and beyond.

  • The Final Whistle

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    The Final Whistle will bring you all the latest news in Scottish Football from the SPL down to the Third Division, Junior Football and the Women’s game. Not to mention the Scotland national side. We will have exclusive interviews with players and managers, not to mention regular round-ups of games in Scotland, as well as Guests galore from all across football.

  • The Football League podcast

    This free show for supporters of all npower Football League clubs is available weekly right throughout the season and is hosted by national radio's "Voice of The Football League" Mark Clemmit.

  • The Football Pubcast

    Pub-based punditry on the beautiful game. A podcast featuring five blokes, in a pub, talking football. May contain strong language, definitely contains nuts.

  • The Football Ramble

    The Football Ramble' consists of 4 blokes who ramble on about football. Find answers to questions that you don't get on Football Weekly, The Game or football365.

  • The Manchester United Redcast

    Comics and diehard reds Paul Tonkinson and Eddie Nestor discuss their beloved United. The funniest ‘Redcast’ out there. Actually, it’s really the only one

  • The Proper Gander

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Carey Marx, Barry Castagnola and guests pick apart, brutalise, elbow in the throat and then, when they’ve really killed it, autopsy the news so thoroughly that the newspapers will think very carefully before they ever report anything again.

  • The Sound of Football

    Every week, Graham, Terry and Chris debate the hot topics in the beautiful game.

  • The Spurs Show

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Spurs diehards Phil Cornwell and Mike Leigh give their view from the Shelf Side in the only podcast that Tottenham fans around the world can’t live without. Major moans, lots of laughs and tip top celebrity guests! Subscribe now and find out what all the fuss is about.

  • The Terrace Scottish Football Podcast

    A new podcast all about Scottish Football. From the Glasgow giants down to the clubs battling it out in the Third Division, finally the beautiful game in Scotland has the football show it deserves!

  • The Whistleblowers

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    Football is our national sport, no matter where you’re from! Mark Webster takes a weekly look at what’s going on in soccer and is not afraid to blow the whistle on the controversies the newspapers are too afraid to report!

  • Tony’s Team Talk

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    The football discussion you can’t afford to miss. Tony Livesey, 5 live commentator Conor McNamara and Dan Walker of Football Focus, discuss the biggest footballing stories. With special guests, regular games and half time entertainment. #TTT

  • UEFA Training Ground video podcast

    • RSS-feed
    • iTunes

    The UEFA Training Ground gives you the chance to learn skills from top stars like Kaká and Zlatan Ibrahimović, while also offering exclusive insights into all aspects of football from tactics and injuries to grassroots documentaries.
